sentences.sContent: An adventurous voluptuary, angling in all streams for variety of pleasures.
sentences.sContent_eng: An adventurous voluptuary, angling in all streams for variety of pleasures.
sentences.sCn: 一个冒险的酒色之徒，涉猎于各种享乐之中。

words.tran: 撩人的；骄奢淫逸的；沉溺酒色的

trans.tranOther: of, relating to, characterized by, or furthering sensual gratification or luxury
